attributes.title: Killed my grandma
attributes.review: After opening the app my grandmother was so profoundly upset by how low quality and absolutely useless the app was that she had a stroke and passed away. Fly high gram gram💸💸

attributes.title: Steals your information
attributes.review: I decided to download this app to follow my lord and savior Donald trump. But I realized it wanted to ask me personal information and started to steal my data. Don’t recommend.

attributes.title: Horrible 💔😾🤢😪
attributes.review: This is a disgusting app run by a worse person. It glitches all the time, and i still haven't received a ticket for trumps event (that sadly i will be missing):) I HATE THIS APP💔

attributes.title: !!!Worst app ever !!!!
attributes.review: I opened the app and it crashed on me and it has inappropriate things to be a app for the “president” and its just the worst it crashes every second terrible 🤢🤢

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: I hate this app because it is just stupid. I also opened the app up to a disturbing ad a Cheeto working out. It was sweating profusely and it was just weird and gross. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: Obliterate this horrendous application
attributes.review: I as so infuriated with rage over the terrible quality of this app. My goodness, who was in charge of this app?! It is absolutely absurd that such a horrible app can exist on apple. Ugh. I’m beyond disgusted.

attributes.title: killed by app
attributes.review: I was in so much pain that I unfortunately passed away from looking at this app. They best be glad I’m not pressin charges 🖕would not recommend 💫💄🧚‍♀️💅

attributes.title: Disappointing
attributes.review: right when i opened the app it straight up asked me to type in my address or i would die

attributes.title: ugh gross ew🤮
attributes.review: first off i open the app and chile ugh gross ew i see a big cheeto in front of me and ugh gross ew then i scroll a little bit and what do i see some more of that big cheeto ugh gross ew a skin routine is needed cause the wrinkles are coming in honey. then i scroll some more and ugh gross ew how many times am i going to see the cheeto like i’ve had enough chile anyways get out of office😘💋

attributes.title: 0 stars if i could
attributes.review: this app made my phone glitch so much 💔 heart been broke So many times i was so excited to download a new clown game but now i'm the clown. sad.
